body.name: Smart Watches for Men Women Sport Modes Fitness Tracker with Sleep Heart Rate Monitor, Pedometer,Remote Photo, Smart Weight Loss, Sedentary Reminder IP67 Waterproof Fitness Watch for iOS Android
features: Multiple Sport Modes : This watch can monitor the sports, precisely calculate each step, lift your wrist to view the sports data, such as steps, calories, distance and so on.
IP67 Waterproof: Happy Playing The bracelet has a strong IP67 waterproof function. Wash your hands, get wet, swim, etc. without removing the bracelet

Full Screen and Exclusive Wallpaper : Easily your look with the latest dial collection, and customize the dial to create your style. Full screen brings you a better interactive experience with quick access to sports data.

Full-featured : Stay connected with phone calls, text messages and other app notifications, as well as convenient tools such as timer, stopwatch, wrist sensing, find phone, remote photo, smart weight loss, sedentary reminder and weather display.
Long-lasting battery life: smart chip, optimized battery, intelligent power saving, no need to charge frequently
